articles.author: Karen Weintraub
articles.title: Long COVID symptoms finally identified: What this means for treatment - USA TODAY
articles.description: Researchers can finally identify the symptoms of long COVID thanks to a study of 10,000 Americans. Here's what that means for treatment.
articles.content: A clearer picture of what's become known as long COVID-19 is starting to emerge, which should eventually allow researchers to treat symptoms that can devastate people's lives for months or years afte… [+7399 chars]

articles.author: JESSE BEDAYN, Associated Press
articles.title: Judge: School district can bar student from wearing Mexican and American flag sash at graduation - The Hill
articles.description: DENVER (AP) — A federal judge ruled Friday that a rural Colorado school district can bar a high school student from wearing a Mexican and American flag sash at her graduation this weekend after the student sued the school district. Judge Nina Y. Wang wrote th…
